title: Complete genome sequences of two
authors: Soliman AM, Ramadan H, Yu L, Hisatsune J, Sugai M, Elnahriry SS, Nariya H, El-Domany RA, Shimamoto T, Jackson CR, Shimamoto T
abstract: Colistin is a last-resort antibiotic used in the treatment of multidrug resistant Gram-negative bacteria. However, the activity and efficacy of colistin has been compromised by the worldwide spread of the mobile colistin resistance genes (
